term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - work of cohesion per unit area
term.title: work of cohesion per unit area

item.text: Of a single pure liquid or solid phase α, w C α is the work done on the system when a column α of unit area is split, reversibly, normal to the axis of the column to form two new surfaces each of unit area in contact with the equilibrium gas phase. w C α = 2 γ α is the surface tension between phase and its equilibrium vapour or a dilute gas phase.
